name: No-Bake Coconut Fruit Tarts
author: So Delicious® Dairy Free
summary: These individual no-bake tarts make a gorgeous Valentine's Day dessert. They'll slay your sweet tooth, plus they're vegan and gluten-free!
ingredients: 1 (11 ounce) bottle So Delicious® Dairy Free Culinary Coconut Milk
directions: Chop almonds in a food processor and add medjool dates
Reserve about 1/8 cup of date mixture and set aside
Prepare two individual-sized tart pans with oil or line with parchment
Divide the date mixture among the two pans and press along the bottom and sides
In a mixing bowl, whip the culinary Coconutmilk with a hand mixer for a minute or so before adding the reserved date mixture and about 5 berries
Spoon the coconut mixture into the tart crusts and pop in the freezer for at least 2 hours
Remove the frozen tarts from the pans
Garnish with raspberries and sliced strawberries
